# Intentionally vulnerable dependencies for testing
# Each has known CVEs with multi-CWE classifications

# Django 2.2.0 - CVE-2022-28346 (CWE-89, CWE-1321)
Django==2.2.0

# Pillow 6.0.0 - CVE-2020-35653 (CWE-400)
Pillow==6.0.0

# PyYAML 5.1 - CVE-2020-14343 (CWE-20, CWE-94)
PyYAML==5.1

# requests 2.20.0 - CVE-2018-18074 (CWE-601)
requests==2.20.0

# Flask 0.12.2 - CVE-2019-1010083 (CWE-20)
Flask==0.12.2
